subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms}} <!-- Not a variant character of 昂 -->

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{rfe|lang=zh}}
{{Han compound|目|卬|t1=eyes|t2=man standing and man kneeling|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} to [[lift up]] the [[eyes]] and [[look around]] <!--《康熙字典》䀚：『《集韻》魚剛切，音卬。舉目視也。』-->

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character lacks character support in mainland China, Taiwan and Hong Kong (not encoded in {{w|GB 18030}}, {{w|CNS11643}} or {{w|Big5}}).
